settings.title: The World’s Most Tested, Trusted and Scientifically Proven EMF Protection

settings.text: Proven through decades of research, clinical trials, and peer-reviewed studies, our technology provides unmatched EMF protection with total transparency. It’s science you can feel safe relying on, every single day.

settings.title: Canada Basketball RJ Barrett's Positive Findings
settings.text: Neuroscientist Dr. Nicholas Dogris described even with RJ's high-output neural activity, there was significant results above baseline range. This was another example of variability in brain activity by individuals and still Aires' presence showed impactful performance.

settings.title: Pro UFC Fighter Maycee Barber's Impressive Results
settings.text: Biofeedback Specialist Chris Wyllie performed an EEG brain scan on UFC's Maycee Barber and improvements were clear with Aires present. Maycee has noted that she no longer gets headaches since she's been using Aires!

settings.title: Four Individuals EEG Brain Scan
settings.text: Neuroscientist Dr. Nicholas Dogris performed four separate EEG demonstrations with individuals and their tech devices. Each scan showed positive results with Aires devices present compared to no Aires.

settings.subtitle: AIRES IN ACTION
settings.title: The Real-time Proof of Aires Tech With EEG Brain Scans
settings.text: EEG brain scans track electrical activity to help doctors understand brain function. Here, licensed professionals mapped EEG results to show measurable changes in brain activity when using Aires products alongside digital devices.
